name: A. Flipping Game
statement:
Iahub got bored, so he invented a game to be played on paper. He writes
integers . Each of those integers can be either 0 or 1. He’s allowed to
do exactly one move: he chooses two indices and () and flips all values
for which their positions are in range (that is ). Flip the value of
means to apply operation - .The goal of the game is that after one move
to obtain the maximum number of ones. Write a program to solve the
little game of Iahub.
